div.p: Local School Improvement Council information can now be found under the About Us menu.
Looking for more information about the Grades 6 - 12 Chromebook Initiative? Click the button below for support, forms, and more information.
Click the Bus Schedules link below the picture to access the updated 2019-2020 Ohio County Schools Bus Schedules.

Are you chaperoning a trip? Helping out in a homeroom or with a school activity? You will need to fill out a OCS Volunteer Application. Our application is now digital and can be accessed clicking the button below.
Click the link to view and comment on the proposed calendar. Calendar Information
Click the link below for the Project Summary Schedule

a.title: Upcoming Events

p.em: - Check out all the great things happening in Ohio County. -

div.p: *For events specific to individual schools, visit the calendar on the website of the school in which you are interested.*

April 21, 2020 8:00 am - 9:00 am
